Package ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting.company

Class CompanyEdgarValuesDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting.company.CompanyEdgarValuesBase
      • ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting.company.CompanyEdgarValuesDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICompanyInfo, ICompanyInfoResult, java.io.Serializable
    public class CompanyEdgarValuesDB
extends CompanyEdgarValuesBase
implements ICompanyInfo
    Provides the reported parameter values for a company by date from the sql database. Per default we use the QuarterlyCumulated filter
    Author:
    pschatzmann
    See Also:
